mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spboard( board_num, title, content, ip, mem_num ) VALUES( spboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{ip}, #{mem_num} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spboard b JOIN spmember m ON b.mem_num = m.mem_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spboard_reply( re_num, re_content, re_ip, board_num, mem_num ) VALUES( spreply_seq.nextval, #{re_content}, #{re_ip}, #{board_num}, #{mem_num} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT re_num,
REPLACE(REPLACE(re_content,'<','<'),'>','>') re_content,
re_date, re_mdate, board_num, mem_num, id, nick_name FROM spboard_reply JOIN spmember USING(mem_num) WHERE board_num = #{board_num} ORDER BY re_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
